entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:58 p.m. PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 13.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 10:00 AM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 13.0°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 8.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
